content: this pdf crochet pattern - the hoodoo classic cardigan - is about to add a touch of timeless elegance to your wardrobe get ready to make your next go-to cardi and create the staple of your sustainable apparel collection as you enjoy the creative process of self-expression through sustainable fashion remember the words of coco chanel who said fashion fades only style remains the same embrace the style and elegance of the this classic cardigan and let your creation become a reflection of your personal style and individuality this 18-page pdf crochet pattern is written in us terms and will be available for download immediately after purchase the written pattern is packed full of photo tutorials but if that s not enough the pattern is accompanied by an engaging video tutorial as well sizes this pattern uses worsted weight yarn and a 6 00mm crochet hook and is written for sizes xs - 4xl the pattern includes a helpful measurement chart packed with all the measurements you ll need to customize your sweater to the perfect fit skill level ambitious beginner __________ join me subscribe to the off the beaten hook community for free patterns video tutorials and printable guides & resources blog https //offthebeatenhook com/ instagram https //www instagram com/offthebeatenhook/ facebook https //www facebook com/offthebeatenhook pinterest https //www pinterest com/offthebeatenhook youtube https //www youtube com/@offthebeatenhook2985 this pattern is for personal use only this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced resold distributed published altered translated posted or shared without authorization you can sell your finished items provided that you credit off the beaten hook as the designer but you may not use my photos for your listing
